overview: Vimal tends to be pragmatic, reliable, and very organized.
Vimal is likely a natural problem-solver: perceptive, analytical, and detail-oriented.
Vimal is likely a natural planner that only feels comfortable with all of the available information.
Vimal tends to make decisions based on logic and feels comfortable knowing all of the details.
Vimal tends to be pragmatic, reliable and accurate.
